articles.title: Thursday's letters: Attacking judges erodes rule of law
articles.description: Politicians on both the left and right often wish they could find a way to “direct” judges to do their bidding. articles.title: U.S. ambassador gives prime minister the cover he needs to cut Canada’s F-35 order
